# Copilot instructions (DevTKSS.MyManufacturerERP)

## Repo orientation
- Repository root: `C:\Users\Sonja\source\repos\DevTKSS.MyManufacturerERP`
- Solution file: `DevTKSS.MyManufacturerERP.slnx` in repo root.
- Code lives under `src/`.
- Documentation lives under `docs/`.

## Uno Platform specifics
- The Uno client app is `src/Client/DevTKSS.MyManufacturerERP/DevTKSS.MyManufacturerERP.csproj` (`<Project Sdk="Uno.Sdk">` + `<UnoSingleProject>true</UnoSingleProject>`).
- `src/Client/DevTKSS.MyManufacturerERP.WasmServer/DevTKSS.MyManufacturerERP.WasmServer.json` exists only to host the Uno `net10.0-browserwasm` target (it is not the primary Web API).
- When asked to change “the Web API”, prefer `src/WebApi/WebApi/WebApi.csproj`.

## Coding/workflow rules
- Do a quick repo scan (search for usages) before editing.
- Do not modify auto-generated code (`// <auto-generated/>`, `*.g.cs`, Kiota output).
- Prefer minimal diffs and reuse existing types.
- Keep C# 14/.NET 10 conventions.
- Validate with `dotnet build` (and `dotnet test` when relevant).

## OAuth defaults refactor (current task context)
- Prefer the consolidated constants provider `DevTKSS.Extensions.OAuth.Defaults.OAuth`.
- Migrate XML docs from the previous `*Defaults` classes onto the corresponding fields in `OAuth` **as-is** (including `<see>` links).
- Update usages across the solution to reference the new constants.
